function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate CO2 concentration and illuminance measurement due to lack of long-term baseline determination","Impact":"Misleading indoor air quality assessment and inability to detect changes in environmental conditions","Mitigation":"Implement manual calibration of monitoring devices in buildings with no long periods of non-occupancy","Technologies":"Manual calibration equipment, third-party detection institution","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, environmental health and safety professionals","Owner":"Facility managers, third-party detection institution, environmental health and safety professionals"},{"Description":"Unreliable temperature, RH, and PM 2.5 concentration measurements due to fluctuating outdoor weather and other factors","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of indoor air quality and environmental conditions","Mitigation":"Conduct manual calibration and maintenance of monitoring devices at least once a year","Technologies":"Manual calibration equipment, third-party detection institution","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, environmental health and safety professionals","Owner":"Facility managers, third-party detection institution, environmental health and safety professionals"},{"Description":"Risk of misleading data due to inaccurate baseline measurements and lack of self-calibration validity under certain conditions","Impact":"Incorrect assessment of the operational reliability of IBEM and potential misinterpretation of monitoring data","Mitigation":"Engage a third-party detection institution to conduct high-frequency data acquisition tests under extreme environmental conditions","Technologies":"High-frequency data acquisition technology, third-party detection institution","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, environmental health and safety professionals","Owner":"Third-party detection institution, environmental health and safety professionals"}]}
